text: Ehsan Yarshater (, April 3, 1920 â€“ September 1, 2018) was an Iranian historian and linguist. He worked in iranology. He was the founder and director of The Center for Iranian Studies, and Hagop Kevorkian Professor Emeritus of Iranian Studies at Columbia University. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Iranian historians Category:Linguists
